shri lanka nidahas pakshaya wisin meheyawana lada saha chandrika kumarathunga wisin nayakathwaya sapayunu deshapapana peramunak wu podu peramunehi 1994 wasarehi mathiwarana jayagrahanayen pasuwa, rajapaksha mahatha kamkaru amathyawaraya lesin path kerini. 1997 wana thuru ohu mema thanathura daru athara, kabinat amathya mandala sanshodhanayakin pasuwa ohuge wishayaya dhiwara ha jalaja sampath amathyawaraya bawata wenas kerini.[3]
